idea-plugin.name: JarLibsConsolidator
idea-plugin.description:
A one-click tool plugin for collecting and consolidating all JAR dependencies in your project. This plugin recursively scans your project directory to find all JAR files, copies them to an "all-in-one" folder, and automatically adds them as project libraries attached to all modules.

Features:
• One-click operation: Right-click project → Select "Add Dependencies"
• Smart scanning: Recursively scans .jar files, skipping common directories (node_modules, target, build, .gradle, .mvn, etc.)
• Duplicate handling: Automatically renames duplicate JARs with suffixes (x.jar → x_2.jar)
• Unified management: Copies to all-in-one/ directory and creates project-level library
• Version compatibility: Supports IntelliJ IDEA 2024.1–2025.1+ (build 241–251.*)

中文说明：
一键收集项目中所有jar包依赖的工具插件。遍历项目目录收集所有jar文件，复制到all-in-one文件夹，并自动添加为项目库。

Project URL: https://github.com/Le1a/JarLibsConsolidator
